cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)

exm.mng: Fall into the moat and you'll be wiser next time (idiom). One only learns from one's mistakes.
exm.pyn: chī yī qiàn , cháng yī zhì

exm.pyn: chī yī qiàn , zhǎng yī zhì
